name: Tactic Code
description:
In the game, as a commander, you only need to give your knight commands through visual programming, they will automatically execute and defeat the enemy (of course, if the command is wrong, your knight will be defeated ).

what? Visual programming?

Yes, it is a programming game. But you don't have to worry about not programming, because in the game you only need to create commands, connect commands, click send commands, and everything is done - yes, it's as simple as this is "visual programming" ^_^.

* Characters assets purchased from the unity asset store.
